rob.name: robbery notifications
rob.description: get dm notifications when someone attempts to rob you

lottery.name: lottery notifications
lottery.description: get dm notifications when you win the lottery

premium.name: premium notifications
premium.description: get dm notifications for updates on your premium membership

auction.name: auction notifications
auction.description: get dm notifications when someone buys your auctions

vote.name: vote notificatons
vote.description: get a dm when you vote showing your rewards for voting

vote_reminder.name: vote reminders
vote_reminder.description: get a dm notification when you are able to vote again

worker.name: worker notifications
worker.description: get a dm notification when one of your workers has reached full capacity

booster.name: booster notifications
booster.description: get a dm notification when one or more of your boosters have expired

payment.name: payment notifications
payment.description: get a dm notification when someone sends you money or gives you an item
